H0.text: roman god of the underworld also called orcus or pluto. Hades

H1.text: roman god of the underworld also called orcus or pluto. Janus

H2.text: roman god of the underworld also called orcus or pluto. Mors

H3.text: roman god of the underworld also called orcus or pluto. Dis Pater

A4.text: Dis Pater ... otherwise known as Rex Infernus or Pluto, is a Roman god of the underworld.

A5.text: Dis Pater eventually became associated with death and the underworld because mineral wealth such as gems and precious metals came from underground, wherein lies the realm of the dead, i.e. Hades' (Pluto's) domain.
